title: Combining component screening, machine learning and molecular engineering for the design of high-performance inverted perovskite solar cells
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00635F, Paper
Boxue Zhang, Huaibiao Zeng, Haomiao Yin, Daming Zheng, Zhongquan Wan, Chunyang Jia, Thijs Stuyver, Junsheng Luo, Thierry Pauport√©
To develop efficient and stable inverted perovskite solar cells, we describe an innovative strategy that combines component screening, machine learning and molecular engineering.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
